greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sum_{p = primes = A000040} 1/(p*2^p).
link: R. J. Mathar, Series of reciprocal powers of k-almost primes, arXiv:0803.0900, eq (66).
formula: A002162 = sum_{n>=1} 1/(n*2^n) = 1/2 + this_constant_here + A157414 + equivalent terms of higher order k-almost primes.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 28 2009
